articles.title: Face coverings 'reduce distance your breath travels by more than 90%' - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: As the breath could contain small droplets of water, experts have said covering up the mouth and nose could help combat Covid-19.
articles.content:
The Government has suggested wearing face coverings in crowded spaces like public transport and inside shops but has not made masks mandatory (Picture: PA)
